overview: Jules Verne Adventures Festival is where science meets fiction. An 17 year celebration of great humanitarian icons, dazzling artists & world-class fillkmakers. All are dedicated to the magnificnet wonders of (& daunting challenges of) our majestic planet. GoPlanet.net is the initiatuve of EMMY Winning Producer Craig Huxley, with a mission of presenting the finest of filk legend tributes, & deepest of documentaries presented in IMAX & Hi-Def. He is honored to be in alliance with filmmakers Jeauffre & Dieudonne & the great Jules Verne Adventures.
title: Heroes of Jules Verne Festival
